Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line service is running with: residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to an earlier Cubs game at Addison; crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is running with: residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to an earlier Cubs game at Addison;

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.
